# Fahey's Window Cleaning

> Professional window cleaning services in Palm Harbor, FL and surrounding areas. Windows stay clean 6-8 months with our professional technique.

## Contact Information
- Phone: (727) 278-7045
- Email: faheyswc@gmail.com
- Location: Palm Harbor, FL 34683
- Hours: Monday-Saturday, 8am-6pm

## Services
- Residential Window Cleaning
- Commercial Window Cleaning
- French Door Cleaning
- Sliding Glass Door Cleaning
- Screen Cleaning (included)
- Track & Sill Cleaning (included)
- Hard Water Stain Removal

## Service Areas
- Palm Harbor, FL
- Tarpon Springs, FL
- Dunedin, FL
- Clearwater, FL
- Safety Harbor, FL
- Oldsmar, FL
- East Lake, FL
- Trinity, FL
- Sarasota, FL

## Key Benefits
- Windows stay clean 6-8 months with our professional cleaning technique
- Fully licensed and insured
- 100% satisfaction guaranteed
- Same-week service available
- Free quotes with no hidden fees

## About
Fahey's Window Cleaning is a locally owned and operated window cleaning company serving Palm Harbor, FL and surrounding Pinellas County areas. We specialize in residential and commercial window cleaning, including French doors and sliding glass doors.

## Website
https://faheywindowcleaning.com
